snippet: Three miniature Mini Coopers are being used at Olympic Park to help tote javelins, discuses, shots and hammers from the field back to their throwers, cutting down on time and volunteer exhaustion.
abstract: Three miniature Mini Coopers are being used at Olympic Park to help tote javelins, discuses, shots and hammers from the field back to their throwers, cutting down on time and volunteer exhaustion.

headline.main: 'Mini Minis' Help Keep Field Events on Track
